description:
Individual workplace based project in any area of ergonomics. Requires agreement from academic staff member to act as supervisor. Students taking over a full year year and enrolling in sem 1 enrol in OHSS7612, students taking course over full year and enrolling in sem 2 enrol in OHSS7613, students taking the course for one semester enrol in OHSS7614.
This course had the previous code of HMST7612 which can be viewed in the archived area within the Course and Program site http://www.uq.edu.au/study/archive/index.html
restricted: Available only to GDipErg or MErg
